Description: Fragment of foot and lower wall of open black-glazed pottery vase; ring foot, grooved on stand surface. Dip-glazed; underside reserved. Incised inscription on underside.
Curator's comments: For the fabric and shape compare the slightly larger British Museum 1910,0222.158.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 563)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GS.116)
